name: Valencia Lawson
review: There was a time when I eschewed shoes -- they were necessary to protect my feet, but nothing else. But three years ago, after guardedly purchasing my first pair of Atheist Shoes at the shop in Berlin, my life and my feet have become much better and happier!

name: Ellis Herman
review: I have now owned a pair of these shoes for about 4 years or so. First, they are very comfortable. These are probably the most comfortable shoe I own

name: Monroe Hoover
review: I bought my first pair in Berlin in 2016 and wore them very little, keeping them pristine as though they were holy. I started wearing them recently and am convinced, all over again, they are the best shoes Iâ€™ve ever worn

name: Dean Walsh
review: I've been following the Atheist Shoes for years, more or less since their first kickstarter (was that 10 years ago? Really?!?)

name: Gloria Villarreal
review: Very comfortable. The sizing is true. The toe-box is roomy. I think I will get the boot style in cognac next.

name: Dolly Perry
review: Your product is high quality.I will buy another Product next month..go ahead
